title: House For Sale In Maharagama
details:
Nations Trust Bank PLC - Sale of Acquired Property

Two storied five bedroom house for sale on 13.25P land. Suitable for residential or commercial purposes.

Access :
From Maharagama along Pamunuwa road passing Temple for about 1.5 km turn right on to a 10ft wide tarred road for about 40 m to reach the property at the end of this road.

Minimum offer : Rs. 21Mn
Offers accepted till 19th June 2018

Prospective buyers may submit their sealed offers in writing to:
Special Asset Management Unit
Nations Trust Bank PLC
242, Union Place,
Colombo - 02

Other condition :
Upon acceptance of the offer a non refundable advance payment of Rs 500,000/- to be paid within 3 working days confirming the offer.

Bank's decision to be considered as final.
